actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility and desirability of a Boston Harbor National Recreation Area in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts.

summary.text: Establishes the Boston Harbor National Recreation Area in Massachusetts. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish a planning commission for such Area. Enumerates criteria upon which the Secretary is to approve or disapprove the Commission's plan. Authorizes the Secretary to make grants totaling $20,000,000 to State and local units of government having responsibility for implementing the final approved plan. Establishes a special account in the Treasury of the United States to hold moneys to be used for such grants.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility and desirability of a Boston Harbor National Recreation Area in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts.
